pkgmetadata.longdescription: R Client for the Microsoft Cognitive Services 'Text-to-Speech' REST API // R Client for the Microsoft Cognitive Services 'Text-to-Speech' REST API, including voice synthesis. A valid account must be registered at the Microsoft Cognitive Services website https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/products/ai-services/ in order to obtain a (free) API key. Without an API key, this package will not work properly.
